posts.post_content:
1909 T206 Clarke-paper loss bottom front border through name and team. Top left corner crease. Staining upper right border above bat and top center to top right border. Also, staining on the back. Finally, surface wrinkle/crease from left border into bend in the shoulder. $70.00.

1909 T206 Flick-a little corner wear. A white surface wrinkle/crease from the left border into the body just below the shoulder. $135.00.

S/h is $5.00.

If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
